Package pages.products

package pages.products
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pages
     
    pages.admins
     
    pages.cart

    pages.login
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddProduct
    This class is used to handle the HTTP requests for adding a new product to the store.
    AddToCart
    Handles requests to add an item to the user's shopping cart.
    DisplayAllProducts
    The DisplayAllProducts class is an implementation of the HttpHandler interface.
    ProcessAddProductHandler
    The ProcessAddProductHandler class is a HttpHandler that is responsible for processing a request to add a product to the database.
    ProcessDeleteProductHandler
    The ProcessDeleteProductHandler class is a handler for the HTTP requests to delete a product from the database.
    ProcessSearchProductHandler
    The ProcessSearchProductHandler class handles the search functionality of a product.
    ProcessUpdateProductHandler
    The ProcessUpdateProductHandler class is an implementation of the HttpHandler interface, which handles HTTP PUT requests to update a product in the database.
    SearchProduct
    Handles the search for a product by ID number.
    UpdateProduct
    The UpdateProduct class is a HttpHandler that handle the http request for update a product.
